website_summaries.verdict: This is a top-of-the-line headset with an impressive warranty, a long range, and all-in-all great quality, features, and performance.
pros: Sits snugly and comfortably on ear, ideal for extended wear
Has long range without sacrificing sound quality
Is backed by company with stellar customer service
Has separate volume settings for earpiece and microphone
cons: Mute button is a bit hard to find and there’s no indication once it’s successfully pressed

customer_reviews.title: easily adjustable and has amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and have used several different headsets. This one out shines them all. It is lightweight, easily adjustable and has amazing sound quality. I’m able to move all around my house, even going outside without any issue. Customer service is great as well, had a problem with the battery and emailed Joe who responded within the hour and had me fixed up. Highly recommend to anyone that is on the phone extensively for their job.
customer_reviews.author: JKBrady911

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this head phone for my husband who uses Dragon Naturally Speaking with his computer. The headset works very well and I love that my husband who is wheelchair bound is not tied to his computer if he wants to take a break. Thank you so much for helping me to give my husband a little more freedom. It's really a big deal to us! Also I was especially blessed that the owner took personal time for a phone call to check and make sure the headset was a good fit and met our expectations. Personal good customer service is so rare these days ! Thanks again---- Julie N.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This headset is comfortable and I really like the wireless feature. Don't be tethered to your desk! The earpiece sounds clear and my customers say the mic sounds clear. A couple things keep me from giving it 5 stars: The Mute button should be easier to differentiate from the volume controls. And the mic boom should offer some flex, rather than rotation only. These are relatively minor things which can be improved in future versions. You should get the Handset Lifter, you'll be glad you did. Customer service is excellent and the reps are very knowledgeable and helpful. Give Headsets.com a call and get your questions answered. Then buy this headset.
customer_reviews.author: PickyPickyPicky

customer_reviews.title: It works with Magic Jack but it is an effort to make it work right
customer_reviews.text: If you have a USB connection to your computer to make and receive calls you have to be at your computer to pick up or hang up. For me that is a problem as I wear my headset around the house and outside so I specifically do not have to run to pick up or end my calls. The sound quality is way better with the Leintner then before when I had a phone connected to Magicjack device and used a Plantronics headset connected to the phone. The Leitner also eliminated the countless wires that my phone and headset required.
customer_reviews.author: GeoH

customer_reviews.title: The product has been a great replacement so far
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand out to replace the pricier Plantronics for my office. The product has been a great replacement so far. Had a technical issue with one of the 5 units (both single and dual ear units) I purchased and the seller was very helpful about trying to fix then advising right away when the issue turned out to be a known defect. They sent a prepaid label to send the defective one back and are sending out a replacement right away. I would definitely buy more of these as our old Jabra units start to fail and as our company grows.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: 9/23/2020 I just ordered my 11th one of these on for my company. They work great with our VOIP phones without the need for lifters and other goofy afterthought workarounds. They also work fantastic on our computers through the USB connection...which is awesome for the number of Zoom meetings we're having these days. The sound quality is exceptional on both ends. I never feel like I'm yelling, and I'm never struggling to hear anyone. The sound cancellation between speaking and listening is completely unnoticeable. The range is also incredible. I've been 100' away from the base, with walls in between, and never lost a signal.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hare

customer_reviews.title: Best headset and support I've ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: This headset has been great. People can hear me crystal clear, I can hear them crystal clear. Quickly mute, turn up/down volume. Comfortable to wear for those hour long meetings and webinars. The mic stopped working about a year and 1/2 after purchase. Sent them an email, had a reply within the hour. They called to troubleshoot a couple items and ended up sending me out a new headset immediately. Joe (rep) even followed up to make sure I received it and was able to sync it and asked if I needed anything else. Cannot recommend their products and company enough. We have several employees using them, all completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was the battery died within 4 hours, and I use the headset all day long. I called Headsets.com and they walked me through resetting the headset and battery. Now it works perfectly and I don't lost battery power in the day. I love that I can switch easily between my phone and computer, which makes it so easy to take a call and then get on a video meeting. Not only is the noise cancelling awesome, the headset also picks up even the slightest noise on the other side. I am amazed by what I hear when I call someone. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwimother

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....lasts the whole day and the range is awesome...now I can go into our basement without loosing connection and even up to my daughter on the 3rd floor...yes 3rd floor...old Victorian house. Love that is has a jingle that let's me know the caller is for me...I never had that with my old headset. Instillation was easy to understand, but if you have an issue, just call the Headset company and they will walk you through. Follow up call from Headset.com was awesome....and the promise of more tootsie rolls. The only thing was that you have to get the lifter for this to work properly....so when the "recommendation" shows on Amazon...get the lifter...it's must.
customer_reviews.author: VanessaE

customer_reviews.title: Great product and helpful staff
customer_reviews.text: Have been using my headset for about a week and LOVE it! Fits nice and the sound quality is awesome. Raghu helped me get it set-up and even suggested that I didn't need the headset lifter but the cord for my specific phone. It was cheaper and looks slicker. Thank you for your help and thank you for a wonderful product. Set up was quick and easy because of the over the phone help. So happy to have found this company that offers such great headsets. And my arm and neck feel so much better not trying to hold the office phone on my shoulder. Life changing.
customer_reviews.author: eyeguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Outstanding Service
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this headset. Works beautifully. I don't have a frame of reference since I've never had to use a headset before, however, it's been great and the service is outstanding. What the company does that's unique/exceptional is include a card that, when you first open the box, tells you to first call a specific rep before you do anything. This was a Godsend since my rep (Raghu) was delightful and got me set up right away without having to read instructions and do it myself. Beautiful process, especially for someone a bit technologically challenged. If only all companies offered this type of service.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for a simple to use and good quality headset for our secretary. She spends a lot of time on the telephone with insurance companies and the DMV for our rolling stock. She does not answer the phone or make calls with the headset so even though this headset has the ability to do that it is not mandatory. This headset has the ability to work well (and simply) just by being off of the charger and the telephone handset being off of the cradle. I am happy to say that Dee is using it quite a bit simply because it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Headset
customer_reviews.text: I have used many headsets and earpieces throughout many years of being on the phone for work and this by far is the most comfortable headset I have worn to date. My preference has always been an earpiece, but the Leitner LH270 is so light to wear and does not get caught in my hair when removing it. I have now converted over to this headset. It charges really quick and is very easy to use. The noise cancellation is superior.. Excellent product and now ordering for the rest of my staff.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: The Ratings Don't Lie - GREAT HEADSET!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific headset! Lightweight, easy to set up, great sound in and out. Connected easily to my computer (I don't need it connected to my phone system) and has worked well in video conferencing. The Customer Service for this organization is stellar. In an era that CS is an after thought, this company was terrific when I called them with a set-up question. THEN, they followed up a few days later just to make sure all was well! Very, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyBR

customer_reviews.title: You Need This Headset
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset. I like it so well, I got one for my home office and one for my corporate office. It is very easy to install, easy to use, and clear as a bell. I wear it all the time at work, and have it attached to my computer. No one knows I am talking on a headset, which is great. Joe from Leitner is a great help, and the call me first really speeds up installation. I highly recommend this headset, and I look to use it for years. Thank You Leitner.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for working from home!
customer_reviews.text: So having to work from home during these current times. Bought these based on the reviews and they work great! Had some trouble at first getting them going but Raghu from customer support got me going right away. His desk number was on a card inside for if you have any troubles. Come to read further in their manual and the solution was there. My bad! We do a lot of on line WebEx and corroborative meetings and these have been working great! Coworkers have said they sound very clear from their end and I hear them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Massingale

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for my husband who works from home and is on calls all day. He was using a wired connected headset that worked well but he couldnt get up from his desk at all. Now he has the freedom to go check the mail while he is on a call. The coverage is amazing and it was so easy to setup. I know the price is higher than you want to spend but you really can’t go wrong with this product. Not to mention, the warranty and customer support is awesome. Don’t look or compare anymore, I did all that for you...buy today. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ott

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Polycom office phone!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many positive reviews on Amazon I purchased the Leitner wireless headset even though it was more expensive than competing products. It works great with our office Polycom phones! Easy to use and the sound quality is great! No one seems to notice that I am not using the telephone handset. Using it with the Polycom phone, a call can be answered or disconnected without lifting the handset, just a push button on the phone. This is very convenient! I had a question with the initial setup and called the Leitner Expert, Raghu B. at headsets.com. He was excellent and I highly recommend Leitner and headsets.com!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent everything
customer_reviews.text: Super customer service that helped me get set right up and great follow up! I am a telecommuter and use this headset through a computer based phone and it works without a hitch. I can now get up to let my elderly dog out in the middle of a meeting without being disruptive. I had originally planned on getting a more expensive Plantronics headset, then it was no longer available when I was ready to pull the trigger. I did another search and found this gem that was not only less expensive, but had a higher rating. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Herston

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Teams from home
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that you receive a name of a tech support rep that you can call when you get the product! Great Tech support person who really helped me. I work from home. I set up the headset with Microsoft Teams. It’s been a few weeks; it works perfectly (needed to change the sound options but not a big deal). For a future release, would like the headset to integrate more with Teams (so muting the headset will mute in Teams and the reverse like a Jaba). But this is a minor thing. Highly recommend for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: I expected more for 250.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: I an currently trying to find a replacement for these. I have listened to myself talk through recorded audits periodically. The microphone volume is low even though it is turned up all the way on the base of the headset as well as on my pc. I have had customers state that they could barely hear me on more than one occasion. Also if I move I can hear myself cutting in and out. I expected more for 250.00 dollars. I had to send the first pair back because of annoying buzz in the earpiece. Not a good experience for me at all,
customer_reviews.author: Fred Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset that I've ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying my Leitner wireless headset. It's very easy to hook up however I did have to call customer service to ask a question and I couldn't have asked for better service. After I got my headset all set up I had a little bit of what I would call electrical noise or some sort of interference so they shipped me a brand new headset and now it works great! I can't stress enough how pleasant the customer service department is. This company has got it together and they are all about pleasing their customers. I'm very satisfied and would highly recommend this headset over Jabra or Plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: Infinitiman

customer_reviews.title: Constant beeping and poor audio
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not reading the description, but these headsets makes a constant beeping noise whenever on mute. Whenever I’m on a call the caller can hear my background louder than they can hear my voice. Battery sucks. I work a 10 hour shift and they don’t last. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty1er

customer_reviews.title: The Range and Quality of each Call!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I was looking for to assist with speaking to clients within my business. It allows me the freedom to walk around without an interference. The range is 350 feet and I use all 350 feet of it as I do a great deal away from the desk! The headset works with most phones but it also states to call to make sure. It works perfectly fine with my VoIP phone system. Sound is perfect, you might have to adjust the volume a little but not much!
customer_reviews.author: MARYLANDSBEST

customer_reviews.title: Incredible customer support
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize there was mic input volume control on the bottom of the base station, customer support was very responsive. I've never had an easier time getting a hold of any customer support before. The quality of the headset and base is average with Plantronics or Jabra, and I'm not especially impressed by the sound quality (average), but I will say the 5 year warranty counts for a lot, maybe enough to make up for the $100 price difference?
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service when needed
customer_reviews.text: I wish the mic could be adjustable so it would be closer to your face. However, the fact that you have a volume control for the mic is a wonderful addition that I have not seen in any other product. The customer service was fantastic. I just wish the headset came with the additional cord that is sold separately so you can answer calls from the headset itself instead of from the actual phone. Overall fantastic product and will be buying more for my staff.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Busby

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Plantronics for the last 15 years. In that 15 years I have had to replace many of them. Batteries, headset parts and most of the time the whole thing. I purchased my Leitner LH270 almost a year ago and as to date I have been very happy with it. The sound from incoming calls is crystal clear and it blocks out all the additional background noise. I would recommend these to anyone that spends a ton of time on the phone and wants a headset that works great, comfortable and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany ribeira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and first-class customer support
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product: 1. Clear audio 2. Easy set-up 3. Great battery life Customer support Probably the best customer support I have ever dealt with. I lost one headset and my kids took the battery cover door from the other headset. I called customer support and two gentlemen assisted me - Ragu (sp?) and someone else. They shipped me a replacement headset and cover free of charge. I received it the next day. On both product and customer service, you couldn't ask for a better headset. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jalen2015

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: I work in the insurance industry and have used dozens of headsets over the years. This headset is hands down the best one i have come across. I am able to wander around at least 100 feet away from my desk and still get a quality connection. Not only is the headset top quality but the customer service is second to none. I will never buy another brand than Leitner. Hats off to Joe in customer service. He helped me on a few issues and was awesome as well. Thanks All for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Japster Elite

customer_reviews.title: "A Helping Hand" and verbally clear.
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my hand. It's in a cast to my elbow. I called to get a helping hand verbally. Joe was very understanding in helping me. With some guidance on settings, I can work without holding a phone on my shoulder and typing one handed. He even gave me some helpful short keystrokes instead of dividing my fingers across the keyboard. I was nervous about calling. I'm so glad I did. I told him how much I love Amazon for giving me direction to this wonderful headset! I don't feel so helpless, and I can work. Even one handed! Very nice customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset and Seller Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great. I have several Plantronics and there is a static feedback that sounds in my ear when I have no caller that was causing me hearing problems. The seller is magnificent. I literally just purchased the headset lifter to go with it although it isn't the best time. I plan to use this seller for any purchases moving forward because the level of customer service is superb!
customer_reviews.author: The Realest Glamma

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation was at best non existent. Even when I called the tech line for help the customer service adviser said he couldn't believe how much back ground noise he could hear . I work in a shop with fans and I couldn't be close to any of them less have one pointed at me . Sound while talking was reverberated into the ear piece so everything I said I would be hearing ( well at least I know what my customers heard ) . All adjustment settings never clear the issue unless it was turned to the lowest settings, but then I could not hear the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael rein

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT HEADSET!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this headset-Its exactly what I was looking for. Have switched to working remote I researched a lot of different headsets, and am glad i settled with this. Hookup to my computer was a breeze and the sound quality is spot on. I cant find any cons to state. If you are on the fence, definitely buy this-Its worth spending a little more to get a high quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: susan8047

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, I upgraded to the LH-370 * Great Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased the LH270 and loved it. great sound quality, batter & warrantee. However what really got me was the customer support (card inside the box tells you to call for any reason). While easy to set up, I just wanted to know everything sounded good and they helped me every step. After a short time, I decided I liked this headset so much I would exchange for the next model up, so I could use with my Bluetooth phone in addition to my computer and desktop phone. I couldn't be more happy.... Both are great !
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, easy to use, and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who is currently working from home temporarily. We have three kids at home and between their on-line learning classes, they are out of their rooms being kids. This headset reduces background noise during calls. Installation was as simple as plugging in to work with Skype. No issues so far (been using it for about 3 weeks).
customer_reviews.author: digiDoc

customer_reviews.title: The range is fantastic and the service is even better
customer_reviews.text: Leitner has out of this world customer service (thanks Johnny!). I lost one of the connecting cables and they sent me one out gratis. I tested the headset in a very noisy shop environment and the noise cancelling worked well. The range is good enough to allow techs to work in the shop while getting phone instructions through the headset. I would very much reccommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Dee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this headset
customer_reviews.text: I am using this headset for both computer and phone communication. I am more than satisfied with ease of use, comfort of the headset itself, the quality of sound (even from 100 feet away) and overall quality of the product. I was previously not aware of this brand until recently, after looking on Amazon and reading other people's reviews. Normally, I would go with Plantronics, but after seeing so many positive 5-star reviews, I had to order this one and try it out. It's everything one could hope for in a headset for computer and/or phone use.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great headset & Company
customer_reviews.text: This headset was just what I was looking for. Light, so it is easy to wear, wireless so I can move around, and the sound is awesome. I sometimes through the computer struggled to hear everyone on a call and the sound is much more clear with the headset and better volume control than just with the computer. I like the single ear so I can other things going on if need be. The headset has made a big difference on conference calls. I also have to say the company has been amazing, reminds me how good customer service should be and that there are still companies out there that care.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Leitner:  First class in quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like how the Leitner was packaged and the way it operates. It has a 5 yr warranty and very easy to operate with good reception. But what is even more impressive is the attention you get after the sale. Customer service made sure I was able to hook the wireless headset up and that it worked properly. In addition, subsequent calls/emails reinforcing their efforts to ensure customer satisfaction was achieved were appreciated as well. Great purchase from a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Trwhdrider

customer_reviews.title: Clear audio, comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Initially gave a low noise cancellation rating because this model only softly covers one ear, which is what I wanted, so I assumed the noise cancellation was minimal if any. However they state the microphone does have noise cancellation technology. Additionally, the headband piece visually appears to be a solid piece without any adjustment options, again I was wrong. You can adjust it in and out and can bend it to fit your head better. You can also bend the microphone arm to move it closer to or further away from your mouth. A very solid and sturdy product and much less expensive than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Headset is fantastic.  Customer support is even better!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with the purchase of this headset. I had a couple of questions when I set it up and I got a live person in seconds and he walked me through my set up and everything worked perfectly. Clients are telling me they can hear me better than ever and I can hear them too! Best investment I have made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: ECasper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and service
customer_reviews.text: Two things are important to me; the headset itself and the service provided. The Leitner LH270 has great sound quality on both ends. I could hear my caller extremely well, and equally important, my caller could hear me. With my old headset, callers would frequently ask me if I was on a headset. With the LH270, that's not the case. When I opened the box from Amazon with the LH270, there was a note to call Headsets.com right away. Best thing I did. Joe walked me through the complete set up and stayed on the line to make sure it was working. I don't see that type of service anymore, but today I did.
customer_reviews.author: Norman G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is so clear. Just a little black box that sits right next to my phone. Perfect in one ear headset and speaker! Set up is super easy. 100% Agree with previous reviews, you should call the customer support number! Really funny and super smart customer service agent. Walked me through set up to the computer that I wasn't going to mess with but ended up being super easy. He helped me adjust the volume so that my voice was clear. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: AWright

customer_reviews.title: Really great product and excellent Leitner customer service
customer_reviews.text: Leitner, the manufacturer of this product is such a nice company. I really liked the free gift after my purchase; what a pleasant surprise! This product is a lifesaver, and even has a mute function right on the wireless headset itself, and very simple and easy to connect to my office phone, and even computer if i desire that part also. Everything worked nicely right away. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: S Moore

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product.  The clarity is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I had a comparably-priced Plantronics headset before this and it does not compare to the clarity of the audio. I like the ease of connecting the headset to its charging cradle. My only knock with the product is that the ear cushion comes off easily. However it is easy to attach back on. Only time will tell if this will be an issue as the headset gets more use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anonuevo Corley

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY headset we use
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased our third Leitner headset for our office, along with the handset lifter. It is pricier than others, but the first 2 have worked great and have a 5 year warranty, so when we hired a another employee we went with this sure thing. We received it, as usual, within a few days after ordering. Written setup instructions are not completely clear, but the phone customer service is fantastic! One call and we were walked through set-up, including making volume adjustments. We could not be more pleased with this product and the company. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LBrewer

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say that this one is better built, more convenient and feels better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new headset. I had a Jabra for years, and I have to say that this one is better built, more convenient and feels better than the other. Plus, the sound is digitally crystal clear. Once you buy yours, call Joe at the plant and he will fine-tune it for you. This company is very customer minded and goes above and beyond most companies I have dealt with. All in all, a very pleasant purchasing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ingersoll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Would buy more.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Inbound voice is clear and plenty loud. Outgoing voice is clear with no distortion. Works perfectly on our older telephone system (Inter-Tel 8500/8520/8560 endpoints) without need for handset lifter. Easy set up. Robust build, and seems better quality than other brand headsets we've tried in the past. Our operator says she loves it! The best she's ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Great Customer Care!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset!! Light weight, don’t cause my ear to hurt, and the battery life is fantastic! Well worth the cost, and the customer service is amazing!!! Only reason a 4 star for volume control is because I struggle finding it. Would say I would buy again, but with a 5 year replacement warranty, I will retire before the warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy, an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for in the office or at home
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few headsets for home office needs, and they were exactly as described. I would recommend this product to any working person who spends a majority of their time on the phone. Joe also was AMAZING in assisting our employees over the phone to set up the wireless headsets. Great product and GREAT service. 10/10 you need to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan P

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Using this headset was a dream. I liked it so much, I decided to get another for my other office. The minor flaw is that as a stand-alone, you have to manually pick up and replace the telephone receiver. In my opinion, this item is simply incomplete without the handset lifter (also available for a reasonable price).
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset but customer care is best
customer_reviews.text: great headset, needs one improvement is to make the mouthpiece a bit longer. What is impressive Headset.com customer service. a few weeks a go, the headset stopped charging, I called headset.com customer service. they were very pleasant to work with & extremely helpful, a new battery was FedEx to me arrived next day. they followed up several times to make sure I'm set & in good shape. real pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Naim-Reno

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone for a year now. After initially calling to get set up help the phone has functioned faultlessly with just one exception. I have a LH70 I cannot get the ear pad to stay on, Without the cushion it is difficult to hear and at times painful. When I try to reattach the pad it will not stay on. Other than this complaint the phone as been a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jerry Stettheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great product Leitner LH270 headset from Headsets.com
customer_reviews.text: I only use this headset on my PC. I have had several Bluetooth headsets never with much luck. This one has a hub wired to the PC and the headset is wireless with huge range so that you can walk away from the PC. It was really easy to connect, I didn't even read the instructions and had it up and working in seconds. They have great documentation and practically beg you to call them (Headsets.com) for help setting it up. The box also had a hand full of Tootsie Rolls and then a couple of days later I got a package in the mail with more Tootsie Rolls, Starbucks gift card and a thank you note.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Love this new headset! I needed a bit of an adjustment with the ear piece but it was quick fix. The company, Headsets.com is truly one of the best I have ever worked with. I’ve been a customer for about 8 years and their customer service is BEYOND! They will do whatever it takes to make you happy. If you’re hedging on buying this headset, I say go for it! If you’re not happy they will make it right! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: D. Potential

customer_reviews.title: Headsets.com is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new high quality headset for the home office, ordered and returned several and then found Joe at Headsets.com, who found us the perfect solution. After describing the make and model of the phone, he told us that the Leitner was the best (and only) headset + lifer combo for our needs. Not only was he right -- the sound quality is excellent--he went above and beyond with his customer service. We walked through the set up together, did a mic test, and now we're ready for work on Monday. I highly recommend Headsets.com and the Leitner -- works better on day one than my Plantronics headset ever did.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neville

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very comfortable, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the initial appearance and feel of a quality product. The headset itself is very comfortable to wear for long periods. Earpiece audio quality is exceptional! Microphone quality also appears to be exceptional from reports of those that I have asked, "how do I sound?" Set up was easy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SteveT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range with quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset! Should have spent the money years ago. Have purchased several headsets, bluetooth ear pieces, etc. and nothing compares to the Leitner LH270. Others would break up and lose sound once I walked out of the office. This one allows for a large roaming area with the same sound/quality as if you never left your desk. Had to do a little tweaking with my work from home phone, but Raghu told me how to get the best sound coming in and going out in a matter of seconds. Don't hesitate to call them! Besides the headset being super comfortable and with excellent sound quality and features... the customer service is probably the best I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Chambers

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: After years of makeshift inexpensive alternatives, I but the bullet and now realize I could have actually saved time and money by just starting out by getting the best from the get-go. Trust me, go through the setup process with them they will help you best utilize ALL of the features. This works on the phone and the computer simultaneously. If you are on the fence, just do it. Lastly, in your order box, they sent Tootsie Rolls as well!
customer_reviews.author: Uwe Philip Kirch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset! Superb Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service provided by Headsets.com is second to none. The headsets are delivered with a note to contact a Customer Service Rep, in my case it as Joe. Joe helped me set up the headset so I hear clearly and others hear me clearly. He had a good sense of humor as well, which is always good on a hectic day.... As someone that eats only Kosher, The packs of candy they sent me had to be given away to a friend...SAD! I love my Leitner LH270 Single-Ear Wireless Telephone Headset and so do the people I call all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Excellent setup support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, comfortable to wear. Upon opening the box, there was a card to call Headsets.com, and speak to a specific representative. Joe Randazzo at Heatsets.com is top-notch. He provided excellent, personal customer service, to ensure that the headset settings were as they should be. Joe even followed up a week later to make sure that all was well. Great headset, even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Venn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the dollars invested
customer_reviews.text: I have a few things here. I don't return much and this headset is bugging me. I work from home for the last 20 years. The ear piece pops off a lot and it anti ain't easy putting it back on. I can't be tooo fragile with it because it's a headset. My ATT CL84207 office phone isn't smooth with it. Plus for $250 you would think the sound would be better than my $69 set. It isn't. Price vs performance is 4/10. I bought it more for the warranty to my recollection because I buy a new headset every two- three years so I thought this was a good investment... darn.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality wireless headphone that performs above my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quality, reliable wireless headphone for my business conversations. This Leitner headphone met and exceeded all my expectations. Secondly, the help I received hooking the headphone to my office phone and making the necessary minor adjustments for perfect noise-free, quality voice reception, again, exceeded my expectations. I highly endorse this company and their products, and their committed follow up to ensure a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is absolutely amazing with this headset. I was able to walk a significant distance away from the base and there was no distortion in sound. It works very well with a phone and also works with programs on your computer such as Discord voice chat. It was not an inexpensive purchase, but I got a high end quality product. Additionally, the service rep, Josh, was very helpful. The company has a contact line that you can call any time for assistance even if you just need a sound check. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayd

customer_reviews.title: Take advantage of the "Call Me First" offer
customer_reviews.text: I think in all the years of buying various computer, telephone and other electronic devices I have never see better customer service. I had read that you should call the "Call Me First" number and in a minutes after calling I had all the volumes set correctly and they checked my set up. A few days later I received a personal follow up call to make sure every thing was working. It cost a little more, but I sure love the five year warranty. It gives you a felling they will be there if something fails.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E Bartram

customer_reviews.title: Over priced! Return is a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: This product is way over priced. The quality is just ok and in some aspects even worse than a $30 headset. But, what I am the most dissatisfied about is that the return process is a hassle. The seller manages the return process, you should email him, and then he sends you a return label with an instruction. . . .Th process takes a few days and you have to have printer to be able to return this item. . . .
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Here you have a quality gadget
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !!! I work as a telephonic interpreter with a lot of background noises sometimes ,,this is without doubt a tool for professionals battery life is good same as quality audio ,it even allow you to work around without losing connection nothing bad to say as of yet Been using it for about 4 months without issues
customer_reviews.author: Yaimy

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I and very impressed with the quality of the product as well as the ease of installation. I read the reviews on many headsets only to hear about how them going bad after a few months. The reviews on Leitner are stellar in comparison. What kinda grabbed me as well was the five year warranty that even includes the battery. Got the product two days ago and wished I would have ordered this 5 years ago, Unbelievable customer service after the sale. Any questions they are more than happy to assist. Great Product, Great People John M.- San Antonio, Texas
customer_reviews.author: John Maxcey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge waste of money. It does cancel background noise but I am constantly told I am cutting out and sound far away and having repeat myself. I use this about 6 hours a day. Battery life is fine. Very frustrating having to constantly repeat myself and talk very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Scgali

customer_reviews.title: Just an incredible headset
customer_reviews.text: We're using this headset in a fairly noisy, open office space. The noise cancelling works really well. Our agents on the line come through crystal clear. It also works well with all of our VOIP and web conferencing solution. The setup was also super simple and the headset is comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O

customer_reviews.title: Incredible customer Service & fantastic range
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset to use during the current work at home environment. It works fantastic for my business & I have it connected to the laptop. The headset is very light & charges easily. It has tremendous range (over 300 feet & has allowed me to freely move around the house as needed on conference calls. I had a small initial issue with the battery not charging & needed to contact the service department. I was most impressed by the customer service & support i received to resolve my small issue. The assistance provided, timely responses & dedicated representative I was assigned was outstanding. Among one of the best customer service experiences I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. King

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: The 270 is a great headset and although I had problems with my first headset with a humming/buzzing noise that didn’t go away with the power on, the customer service stands out as they replaced right away and had a brand new headset to me in 2 days. I replaced the first one no issues and actually ended up choosing a different pair with different features with the help of headsets.com. Great company and wouldn’t hesitate buying any pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Graves

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service 10/10
customer_reviews.text: The customer service on this headset is AMAZING! I worked with Joe Randazzo from Headsets.com to help me use my headset the best, do a factory reset, and get a battery replacement and Joe was completely on top of it! He was so cool and friendly to work with! And the tootsie rolls were great too! Not joking, there were legit tootsie rolls involved!!!! Great company!! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: CCelaya

customer_reviews.title: Works on both Phone and Computer! Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great Customer Service with Headsets.com. This Leitner headset works great with switch between phone and computer; one can use for phonecalls, then switch and use dictation into computer (we use for Dragon dictation software). Quick delivery and customer support always available.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna H

customer_reviews.title: Clear Sound, much better than bluetooth headsets
customer_reviews.text: I love the headset. The sound is awesome and the range of the headset is also great. I can move around and the sound is still great. This is one of the biggest advantages compared to any Bluetooth headset. For me the sound quality is so much better than Bluetooth. I simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: Monika W.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and hands free to type while chatting with clients
customer_reviews.text: Rarely leave reviews, but love the headset! Sound is crystal clear for both me and my clients. Best additional benefit is that I can type and chat with a client at the same time, so I stay productive. I also use it for dictation to typing and the headset works great, I tried cheaper one in the past, the extra money spent on the Leitner well worth it. In addition, Customer Service is excellent. I have had a couple of questions along the way to fine tune the headset and called Leitner and spoke with a real person immediately, who answered all my questions. For me this is the difference between a good product and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight, comfortable, easy to setup and use. I plugged it in to my computer and started using it. I had to adjust the volume on my Avaya. There is a volume down, up, and mute on the side. So far I love it. Maybe next time I will get the duel ear option.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased three of these headsets and the handset lifters for use in our leasing office. We were very pleased with the ease of installation. The headsets work well, convenient to use and the clarity is excellent. The hands free operation is very helpful to our operation. We are very pleased with the produt. Fred Schultz, Land Yacht Harbor of Melbourne, FL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: What I most appreciated along with the product itself was the excellent customer service provided by Raghu Balakrishna. He was friendly, helpful and generous. He is a very good representative of this product and even sweetened the deal with some candy, which was a nice touch. I would recommend both. Many thanks, KRN
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Superb Service
customer_reviews.text: Headset works well and is easy to set up. The real value is in the personalized service. I called "Joe" and had him walk me through the setup - which was actually really easy. Not only did Joe do that, he also had me walk around for 5 minutes and check for deadspots. (None) when I had a problem with the foam ear piece coming off, they offered to replace. Truly Excellent and Appreciated Service - I wish I could purchase everything through Leitner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & great service! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Comfy on my head & ear. Stays out while I do busy things with my kids while I'm on a call. Most of all my neck does hurt. Other cheaper devices do not compare. Totally awesome customer services. I had to call for a few things and they always answered quickly. Extremely friendly. Thanks for the box of tootsies!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved them! My hubby got them for me for Christmas (yes for work) but couldn't have gotten a better gift. Easy to use. Long range, this headset works from my office all the way around the house. Clear voices. I mean I love it. I need to buy one for husband for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Oganyan

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am having a pleasant experience with my headset. In the beginning I had some difficulty with people hearing me so I contacted Joe (the rep who card came in the box to assist with sound quality how cool is that!) he was able to tell the issue right away. He was very professional, patient, and knowledgeable. Needless to say a couple questions and jokes later I was up and running. Now that is what I call great customer service. I would absolutely recommend this headset and company as they have a 5 year warranty what else could you ask for. Thanks again Joe!!! Ersi Family
customer_reviews.author: Michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset was purchased for use with our new Polycom office phone system. The headset was super easy to install and setup. It's lightweight and sound quality and battery life are great. It has a long range, too. Nothing bad to say about this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This product was an investment for our small business, but after having been disappointed with some $100 headsets, we felt it was worth a try - especially since we are call center environment. 1. Being wireless makes us so much more productive. 2. Set up of this product involves a few more hoops than others - but fortunately it is backed by great customer support. 3. We have not had one single call in which the other person complained of call quality or feedback. Completely thrilled with this headset and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mysty

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Beyond the Sale Service
customer_reviews.text: This is our first set of headsets. One wired, the other wireless. We've had them for 2 years now and are fully satisfied with them. But here's the real thing that impresses me: After two years, the very nice rep from CA called to remind me about the free battery replacement I had coming if needed. He called me!! That kind of service just doesn't happen these days. Well done Leitner. You've won my loyalty. And thanks again for the great service to my new rep friend in Cali!
customer_reviews.author: JM Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headset and customer support
customer_reviews.text: This headset is the best I've ever used. Leitner reps reach out without prompting to ensure that set up goes smoothly and that the headset is in great working order. It's comfortable, light, and the reception is clear as a bell. Highly recommend the lifter, which makes answering and making calls even easier. Only complaint is that Leitner includes candy in the shipping box. I'm a low carber so just threw it away. It's an unnecessary expense on their part. But a very minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: PaulMD

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Plantronics headsets. Super bonus feature: it works with both phone and computer voip/webmeetings: the single Leitner unit replaced both my old headset and my computer headset. It's even possible to patch in a phone call into the web meeting. Desk clutter is way down; headset performance and reliability are way up. Customer service (single phone call to clarify an installation issue) was fast, proactive and smart.
customer_reviews.author: DeepyPup

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with a Leitner Headseat. I ordered the Leitner LH270 Single-Ear headset along with the Lifter. It is easy to install, easy to use, and very clear on both ends. It is highly recommended that you purchase the Lifter to get the most benefit from using a headset. It is sold separately. Another feature about the Leitner is the quality of service. Not only did it ship quickly, but the company is ready and willing to help you set it up, make adjustments and just make sure you are happy with your purchase. Quality control and customer service is becoming a rare commodity these days, but not at Leitner!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene B Brown

customer_reviews.title: Add the Leitner Headset to your system...don't wait as long as I did.
customer_reviews.text: My new headset from Leitner does everything I expected it to do and then some. I'm 62 yrs old...a little slow to adopt new technology...never used a headset until now. Having both hands free during conversations exchanging detailed information...combined with the mobility / range allowing me to get out from behind my desk...is now my new normal. Wish I had adopted this technology years ago. The Leitner headset is a bit pricey but don't let that deter you...If all of a sudden they became unavailable...I would not part with mine...if offered 10 times the price I paid for it...Eric Brosius / President / ProFile Home Loans
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first wireless headset in 1992. It was like wearing a football helmet. Since then I have gone through many wireless headsets. All the usual suspects. My most recent was a GN Netcom 9120. I balked at the price of the Leitner, but bought it anyway. Considering I use it daily for my livelihood it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ClayG420

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed -
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Had been using another brand and was always being told by customers "I can't hear you", "you're breaking up", "sounds like you are under water", etc. Yet, I could hear them perfectly fine. I cannot believe the reception I get from the Leitner brand. Yesterday while talking on the phone, I went from the furtherst point upstairs and got perfect coverage all the way up and down; 4,060 sq ft. Also, I experienced the BEST customer service with follow up to make sure I was still up and running. Great job Leitner!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Glasco

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset! I wear it about 8 hours a day, and it is super comfortable. You can also switch from ear to ear. It works with both my computer and my Cisco phone. When I use it connected to my computer, any audio from my computer plays through the headset automatically. Raghu with customer service is fantastic. Super friendly, patient, and knowledgeable. I definitely recommend this product and company. Thanks for the Tootsie Rolls!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Great Service, Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I spend all day with a head set on, overall this headset is a cost effective choice for business communications. The headset itself is feature rich and Customer service is a notch above! Headsets ( the seller) offers Live support and audio checks after installation to make sure you have it right! This alone is a valuable consideration as depending on the phone type, correct installation can be confusing. No one wants to listen to you communicating through an improperly configured head set when you can barely be understood. Between the LH270 head set and customer service, they made it easy to sound like a Pro! Thank You
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a headset that had range and was dependable. Have tried more Bluetooth headsets that I care to think. With the money I spent on those I could have owned three of these that actually work. It was a breeze to set up. Hasn't had the first issue. Here's something you won't believe... the support folks called me to be sure it was what I expected. Then helped me check to see that it was working at optimal levels. I wish I could give them a 6-star rank! And the icing on the cake was that this was less expensive than the nearest competitor. Bottom line -- I could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Marzahn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and product support
customer_reviews.text: The headset is a true life saver or folks in the office who are on the phone frequently, permits obvious hands free typing, but equally importantly, callers do not think the person they are talking to is on a headset. Highly recommend the product/headset.Outstanding customer other is a plus including checking with us to see if we are satisfied with the product, having any issues and gently asking if we need more. Randy James
customer_reviews.author: Randolph James

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Even Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Leitner headset and really liked the comfort level and performance. However, it turns out the person on the other end of the line couldn't hear me very well. It turns out it is an issue with the phone that it is connected to, which has nothing to do with the headset itself. Anyway, after contacting customer service we were able to find a solution that works great now! They truly went above and beyond to get me up and running properly. The fabulous customer service will keep me coming back!
customer_reviews.author: S. Musielak

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I've went through a couple of Plantroics sets and have always been let down. I purchases this set and the range and sound is amazing. I can freely walk anywhere in my house and talk on the phone. The technical support is to die for. There's several setting and cables that have to be exactly right depending on the phone. The support people were the friendliest and most helpful I've ever seen. Wishin matter of minutes they had me setup to my Cisco phone, Mac computer and even included a couple of freebies. All said and done, I would highly recommend this over any bluetooth set.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Leitner LH270 & lifter from headsets.com. Replaced a Plantronic W02 headset (poor audio quality). Only used the Leitner for a day but the audio is excellent. Headsetsets.com encourages buyers to call Customer Service for initial setup. I did so & was transferred to Joe Randazzo. The guy's terrific. Helped me tweak the unit a bit so it interfaces seamlessly with an older Panasonic KC-DT343 desk phone. Exemplary customer service. Product recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Quality headset with excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset and has given me much-needed comofort and freedom at the office. Additionally, the customer support I received was fanstastic! Joe called me and walked me through the set up of my headset and ensured that it was working properly. He also made sure I had his direct-dial phone number and encouraged me to call him with any potential issues down the road. I would highly recommend this headset (which come with a 5-year warranty which is a nice bonus)!
customer_reviews.author: MariaS
